definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
(in the negative) (not) to be trifled with

sentences.english: Such an illegal act should not be treated lightly.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的違法行爲不可等閒視之。

sentences.english: We don't take air pollution lightly, like you do.
sentences.chinese: 對待空氣污染，我們可不會像你們那樣等閒視之。

sentences.english: Those indifferent fold love, who is easy to.
sentences.chinese: 那些淡漠褶皺的情絲，被誰等閒的扯碎。

sentences.english: The smoke he grow well, and not easily.
sentences.chinese: 煙稞長得好，中耕不等閒。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, some children autumn, lightly after a flower.
sentences.chinese: 可惜些兒秋意，等閒過了黃花。

sentences.english: We cannot afford to ignore this warning.
sentences.chinese: 我們對這個警告不能等閒視之。

sentences.english: Quintana is a crafty southpaw with good skills and is by no means a walk - over.
sentences.chinese: 昆塔納是個技術出色的狡猾的左撇子，絕非等閒之輩。

sentences.english: Being lucky can turn over to open this volume, in usually persons eye all definitely not of no importance.
sentences.chinese: 有幸能翻開本冊者，在尋常人眼裏都決非等閒之輩。

sentences.english: This would create a "breeding ground for conflict"  that would leave the other person feeling like they are being taken for granted.
sentences.chinese: 而這將滋生矛盾，讓另外一個人感覺自己被等閒視之。

sentences.english: I've found that he is by no means ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 我發現他絕非等閒之輩。

sentences.english: They think little of the difficulties and setbacks on their way forward.
sentences.chinese: 他們對前進道路上的艱難險阻視若等閒。

sentences.english: He's nobody here in town but I suppose he's a somebody in his own village.
sentences.chinese: 他在城裏默默無聞，我想他在本村卻非等閒之輩。

sentences.english: This problem deserves our full attention. It's not to be shrugged off.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題值得我們關注，決不可等閒視之。

sentences.english: I do not easily give any promise, once made, will do.
sentences.chinese: 我不等閒給任何人諾言，一旦許下，就一定會做到。

sentences.english: "Is not afraid of red army expedition difficult, the long march only afford".
sentences.chinese: “紅軍不怕遠征難，萬水千山只等閒”。

sentences.english: The names mentioned on the cables are political veterans, not just any Tom, Dick, or Harry.
sentences.chinese: 電報引述的人物都是政壇翹楚，皆非等閒之輩。
